title: File
description: File describes an input sourced by a file.

compress.description: Compress indicates whether the file should be compressed with gzip.

mediaType.description: MediaType is the media type of the file.

path.description: Path is the path to the file.

runtime.Type.$comment: Type represents a structured type with an optional version and a name. It is used to identify the type of an object in a versioned API.
